duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, prepare and implement the instructional process for students with Individualized Education Plans (IEPs) within the learning center and/or classroom.
Establish a climate that promotes a firm, fair and respectful classroom environment and focus on social development and group responsibility.
Establish Providing direct subject based instruction and/or working in a team environment to collaboratively and/or co-teach curricular subjects as required in IEP.
Modify curriculum and assist with differentiated instruction for students as well as staff.
Maintain the physical center, furniture, and supplies in a neat and orderly condition according to procedure.
Keep up to date with research-based practices and developments in the subject area.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree or higher in education or related field.
Meet state teaching certification and/or licensing requirements.
